snippet.title: Visual novel about an baby whale in an alien planet | South Scrimshaw
snippet.description:
I was in the perfect mood to experience this story. By allowing myself to really believe the fiction that was being presented to me I was able to appreciate and see the characters not as fictitious illustrations but as complex organisms capable of experiencing fear, doubts, curiosity, love, pain, trauma. This game has it all and I really congratulate the developer for creating this handcrafted story in this beautiful packaged called South Scrimshaw. 
There are two flaws which I will mention.
- The game includes a machine generated narrative voice over which I have no problems with, but I believe having a human actor would have carried the game to new heights.
- The audio levels are not properly balanced. There are times in which I can hardly hear the narrator as a consequence of the background music being much too loud. During my playthrough I was tempted to pause the game and check the options to see if a volume slider was present. Ultimately I decided not to since doing so would have ruined my immersion which I was enjoying so much. At the time of writing I checked and indeed there are audio sliders in the options, but I would have been great to have nailed and hammered the audio levels right from the start.

South Scrimshaw on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2443110/South_Scrimshaw_Part_One

---

snippet.description:

The new Mana Orb having the potential to apply 15 random buffs is a change I look forward to enjoying. The new Holy Spear item is amazing. This item makes Ranger a lot more tankier now, and its addition expands the number of potential builds away from just crit Ranger.

snippet.title: I hate spike builds | Backpack Battles
snippet.description:
Ripsaw Blade is too good. Three gem slots? wtf were they thinking. It's not even that rare of an item either. Great against spike, Hungry Blade, and Bloodthorne builds. The developers really have got to add some other way of negating all these spike builds infesting the ladder these days. It would really open up the number of potential builds.

snippet.title: Complete Noob Plays Civilization V | First Game in a Decade EP9
snippet.description:
A complete Civilization noob tries to win their first game of Civilization 5.
I first played this game a decade ago, had some fun with for a bit, but I recall this feeling of not knowing at all what was happening.
Now a decade later and hopefully a decade smarter I come back with a with newfound determination to finally win a game of Civilization 5.
